questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A busy street
B) A large cactus and a "Now Open" sign
C) A group of people
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A mountain
B) A large cactus
C) A "Now Open" sign
D) A car

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A garden
B) A "Now Open" sign
C) A playground
D) A bench

What is in the background of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A hotel and palm trees
C) A lake
D) A mountain range

What kind of plant is prominently featured in the photo?
A) Pine tree
B) Cactus
C) Oak tree
D) Maple tree

What does the sign in the photo say?
A) Closed for Renovation
B) Now Open
C) Under Construction
D) Grand Opening Soon

What type of trees are visible in the photo besides the cactus?
A) Oak trees
B) Palm trees
C) Pine trees
D) Birch trees

What is the color of the building in the background?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Beige
D) Red

What is the surface like in the foreground?
A) Snow-covered
B) Rocky and sandy
C) Grassy
D) Paved with bricks

What is the likely purpose of the sign in the photo?
A) To advertise a sale
B) To announce a new opening
C) To warn of danger
D) To provide directions

What is the primary color of the sign?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White with black text
D) Green

What is the material surrounding the base of the cactus?
A) Water
B) Rocks
C) Grass
D) Sand

What is the color of the building adjacent to the sign?
A) Red
B) Yellow
C) Gray
D) White

What kind of natural feature is prominently displayed in the photo?
A) A lake
B) A mountain
C) A cactus
D) A waterfall

A) Blue
B) Green
C) Red
D) Yellow

What is the texture of the ground around the cactus?
A) Smooth
B) Rocky
C) Muddy
D) Grass-covered

What is the condition of the sky in the photo?
A) Overcast
B) Clear and blue
C) Partly cloudy
D) Stormy

What kind of terrain is around the cactus?
A) Wet and muddy
B) Dry and rocky
C) Snow-covered
D) Grass-covered

What is the relationship between the cactus and the buildings?
A) The cactus is in front of the buildings
B) The cactus is behind the buildings
C) The cactus is beside the buildings
D) The cactus is on top of the buildings

What is the color of the sky in the photo?
A) Gray
B) Blue
C) White
D) Pink

What kind of plants are visible in the photo?
A) Desert plants
B) Aquatic plants
C) Forest plants
D) Alpine plants

What is the main visual element in the foreground of the photo?  
A) A tree  
B) A cactus  
C) A lake  
D) A mountain

What is the most prominent feature of the landscape in the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A body of water
C) A large cactus
D) A dense forest

What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Commercial area

What is the message conveyed by the sign in the photo?
A) Warning
B) Celebration
C) Announcement of a new opening
D) Directional guidance

What is the color of the sign in the photo?
A) Red
